content: crochet a cute bald eagle amigurumi with this free crochet pattern it s my version of the majestic creature but in a more cuter form if you place them in a nest they look like adorable baby eagles its distinctive features include the white chest feathers a hooked beak and talons it loves to soar across the sky it s part of my bird amigurumi series so be sure to check out the other crochet bird patterns such as dreamland owl 1 eggy the cute chick 2 duck amigurumi 3 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~` **approximate size of crochet bald eagle ** 4 inches tall 10 cm tall i d love to see how your bald eagle amigurumi turns out don t forget to tag me with your projects on my instagram @ami_amour 4 you can also crochet along with me with the bald eagle video tutorial 5 on my youtube channel ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet in the round half_double_crochet slip_stitch chain stitch increase and decrease 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/owl-amigurumi-dreamland 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eggy---the-cute-chick 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/duck-amigurumi-fair-is-fowl 4 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 5 https //youtu be/hs6y7dfdeho
